title: Which is the most peaceful country in the world in 2019? - Quora

response.answer_text: The most peaceful country in the world is the Canada. In the today time people are migrating to the canada in the more number because education is also good as well as environment is really excellent. There is also strict rules and regulation and people are quite of time punctual. Therefore the population of the Canada is also less in number so government allow international student to come and settle over there and both gets benefits.

Canada and all of Europe (Except for Russia and Ukraine,both are at war, Russia is with the Chechen rebels and Ukraine is with rebels. Other non European countries include Australia, Some of Asia (excluding the Middle East), Some of Africa (not counting North or the Sahel region), most of Latin America (except the Northern Triangle,Venezuela and Columbia). Peace has been improved,but there’s war in the Middle East and Africa. Education and social relationships have seen a massive rise in the past 10 years.
